themes: Impact of funding decisions on nonprofit sustainability
Frustration with prioritization of marginalized identities
Conflict between progressive values and perceived fairness
key_phrases: The city’s grant program KILLED the nonprofit literary press I worked for
refusing to give us even a small grant to struggle through another year
handed out grants to anyone who could make the case that they were 'marginalized'
not when it excludes anyone who isn’t ethnic, gay, trans or disabled enough to get even a crumb at the table
barriers_identified: Exclusion of organizations not representing marginalized identities
Grant criteria perceived as overly focused on identity categories
Lack of support for established or traditional organizations
